code: import React from"react";import Button from"./Button";import{useSpring,animated}from"react-spring";import"./Step.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Step=function Step(_ref){var number=_ref.number,description=_ref.description,children=_ref.children,goToNxtStep=_ref.goToNxtStep,currentStep=_ref.currentStep,show=_ref.show;var showWhatNxtBtn=number<4&&currentStep==number;var slowL2RAnimationStyle=useSpring({repeat:true,cancel:currentStep<number,to:[{opacity:1,transform:"translateX(0px)"}],from:{opacity:0,transform:"translateX(-500px)"},delay:500});var fastL2RAnimationStyle=useSpring({repeat:true,cancel:currentStep<number,to:[{opacity:1,transform:"translateX(0px)"}],from:{opacity:0,transform:"translateX(-500px)"},delay:250});var fastT2BAnimationStyle=useSpring({repeat:true,cancel:currentStep<number,to:[{opacity:1,transform:"translateY(0px)"}],from:{opacity:0,transform:"translateY(-500px)"},delay:250});return show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"step step".concat(number),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{style:slowL2RAnimationStyle,className:"step__desc",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"step__head",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{style:fastL2RAnimationStyle,className:"step__stringno",children:"Step ".concat(number)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{style:fastT2BAnimationStyle,className:"step__bigno",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"step__no",children:number})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(animated.div,{style:fastT2BAnimationStyle,className:"step__main",children:[children,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"step__next-action show_".concat(showWhatNxtBtn),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"What Next 🤷‍♀️?",onClick:function onClick(){return goToNxtStep(number+1);},variant:"solid"})})]})]},number);};export default Step;
